ctx: pose (E := fun (M : R) => exists n : nat, M < u n).
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros u. pose (E := fun (M : R) => exists n : nat, M < u n). destruct (completeness E) as [M HM | HnotM]. - left. exists M. intros n. apply not_lt. intro H. apply HM. exists n. apply H. - right. intros M. apply HnotM. exists M.
